discourse_list.title: UX Improvement ideas for 'Save' section of Oasis.app

content.content: First of all, major props to the Foundation’s team for their great work on Oasis.app.  The improved interface is great. I’ve recently interacted with the DSR module, and I’m not sure if rewards haven’t accrued yet, or how much I’ve earned vs my original deposit.  Even small amounts that are accrued with each block would be awesome to see. An interface idea is to inform users how much Dai they have accrued from the DSR, this can help incentivize users to keep their Dai locked. Here is a visual idea:  dai.png809×605 30.4 KB
